definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: No wonder now zombies are synonymous with being Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 無怪乎“行屍走肉”成了中國人的定義同義語。

sentences.english: According to the research logic of X-efficiency theory, property right is the synonymous of the institution.
sentences.chinese: 按照X效率理論的研究邏輯，產權是制度的同義語。

sentences.english: Since the massive homogeneous news has been the treasure house of language materials in studying synonymous texts.
sentences.chinese: 大量存在的同質新聞是同義語篇研究的語料寶庫。

sentences.english: Impetuosity is the synonym of incompetence.
Since then densely packed high-rises have become synonymous with modernization.
sentences.chinese: 高密度的建築開始成爲現代化的同義語。

sentences.english: The very term "Chinese" became a synonym for something both hateful and ridiculous.
sentences.chinese: “中國”一詞變成了既可恨又荒謬的同義語。

sentences.english: It is sometimes used synonymously with behavior therapy as defined above.
sentences.chinese: 它有時和以上解釋的行爲療法作爲同義語使用。

sentences.chinese: 它有時和以上解釋的行爲療法作爲同義語使用。
